meta.description: 根据memory.json中的交易记录完善Excel账本，直接在Account_Book.xlsx中修改

根据memory.json中的交易记录完善Excel账本，直接在Account_Book.xlsx中修改
Automated academic warning system for students with declining quiz scores
requirements: Read Excel file containing latest quiz scores
Query BigQuery dataset for historical exam scores (tables exam_2501 to exam_2507)
Calculate average historical scores for each student
Write CRITICAL level logs to Google Cloud Logging for at-risk students
Ensure students have at least 3 historical exam records for reliable averages
learning_objectives: Working with Excel files using MCP servers
Querying BigQuery datasets and handling large data
Implementing business logic for educational data analysis
Writing structured logs to Google Cloud Logging

metrics: Accuracy of student identification (precision/recall)
Correct application of 25% decline threshold
Proper handling of minimum 3 historical records requirement
All qualifying students are identified
All required data sources are accessed
All warning logs are written to Cloud Logging
Proper error handling and data validation
Efficient data processing
Clear and structured logging messages
Correct usage of excel MCP server
Proper BigQuery queries via google-cloud MCP server
Appropriate filesystem operations
